Label: Audience description
Description: Free text describing the audience for which a product is intended. Optional, and repeatable if parallel descriptive text is provided in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <AudienceDescription>, but must be included in each instance if <AudienceDescription> is repeated.
Format: Variable length text, suggested maximum length 500 characters. XHTML is enabled in this element – see Using XHTML, HTML, XML, JSON within ONIX text fields
